entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Xamarin.Android.D8.targets(87,5): error MSB6006: "java.exe" exited with code 1. #24702
  • [Android] ListView + DataTemplateSelector + HasUnevenRows issue #24701
    Backlog
  • Problem Statement 2: Upgrading projects from .shproj to .csproj is unsatisfactory and lacks sufficient documentation and support. #24697
  • Problem Statement 1: The process of upgrading projects from older versions of Xamarin to MAUI is challenging and lacks sufficient documentation and support. #24696
  • Shell Title View Overlaps Status Bar on Android when Layout Limits removed #24694
  • WebAuthenticator crashes on first start of browser #24692
    Backlog
  • maui blazor , js fetch post FREEZE the resonpse #24690
  • COMException E_FAIL with CollectionView and PathGeometry #24685
  • Android GestureRecognizers not working with custom control and frame #24684
  • The width of the label cannot be obtained #24681

Closed

  • [iOS] Collectionview itemslayout styling changes with footer #21728
    .NET 8 SR9
  • iOS/Windows touch inputs sent to controls behind #24608
  • Keyboard tabbing around a Modal Page cycles focus onto previous page. #19105
    Backlog
  • Scrolling a TableView causes java.lang.IllegalArgumentException #22372
    Backlog
  • Nested Entry View In A Frame Causes Crash #15196
    Backlog
  • Freeze when invoking SecureStorage.GetAsync().Result multiple times on Windows #24687
  • on Android, VerticalTextAlignement doesn't work with the control : 'Entry' #12339
    Backlog
  • Vertical Text Alignment Not Working in Entry Control on Android Platform #24682
  • Unable to Xamarin.iOS binding project migration #24686
  • Binding OnIdiom inside IsVisible causes crash in release mode #16725
    Backlog
  • Using Binding with OnIdiom throw this exception on release mode only: InitializeComponent () System.InvalidCastException: Unable to cast object of type 'Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Binding' to type 'System.Boolean'. #24500
  • OnIdiom with Binding doesn't work in Release mode #22877
    Backlog
  • OnPlatform doesn't work with AppThemeBinding on Windows in Release mode. #19388
    Backlog
  • [Windows] [RC2] Conditional ToolbarItem Text Display Using OnIdiom Not Working in Release Mode #18697
    .NET 8 SR9
  • Support direct use of Path's as the Source property in the ImageButton, Image, and Button controls #24084
    Backlog
  • Resize, when 200% Zoomed Items present under ingredients section are getting truncated: A11y_.NET Core_Recipes App My Recipes Recipe_Recipe Screen_Resize. #22969
    .NET 8 SR9
  • HybridWebView: browser dev tools not working #24497
    9.0-rc2
  • Pending code to port from Renderers to Handlers #4808
    Backlog
  • [Enhancement] Provide public methods for access to Page.InternalChildren #2899
    Backlog
  • Editor/Entry controls don't raise Completed event consistently cross-plat #9796
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Clear out prototype cell when changing ItemSource #24700
  • Ensure disconnected ItemsViewHandler doesn't hold onto the items source #24699
    area-controls-collectionview
  • [Windows] Handle focus events using `FocusManager` (take 2) #24695
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-keyboard, t/perf
  • Revert "[X] do not apply Bindings if DataType doesnt match (#22056)" #24693
    area-xaml
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #24691
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • [C] Add ImageSource as LogicalChildren of MenuItem #24688
    area-xaml
  • [iOS] Fix Editor control does not scroll properly on iOS when enclosed in a Border control. #24683
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor

Merged

  • [iOS] Fix for CollectionView single item horizontal alignment issue when using ItemsLayout with a Footer. #24564
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Fix for the Nested Entry View In A Frame Causes Crash #24543
    community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • Use some of the new iOS APIs #24605
  • [C] Allow OnIdiom/OnPlatform to return a Binding #24594
  • [xamlc] return early in `NodeILExtensions` for `ValidateOnly` #24493
    area-xaml
  • Fix HybridWebView browser dev tools on iOS/MacCat #24679
    area-controls-hybridwebview
  • Editor completed event is not triggered properly when unfocused #24207
    community ✨, area-controls-entry, s/pr-needs-author-input, area-controls-editor

Updated

  • [net9.0][Enhancement][iOS] platform specific for entry's keyboard to have a done button #24645
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • [ci] Build with arcade #24625
    area-infrastructure
  • [IOS] - Fix error when running new template maui app on iOS #24567
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Improve measure invalidation and legacy Layout(s) performance #24532
    area-layout, community ✨
  • [testing] Fix CollectionView2 UITests #24471
    area-controls-collectionview, area-testing
  • Improve keyboard scrolling with editors, contentInsets, and different keyboards #24589
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-entry, area-controls-scrollview, area-keyboard
  • Fix Frame offsets inner content view by 1pt #24582
    community ✨, area-controls-frame, s/pr-needs-author-input
  • [iOS] Ensure disconnected ItemsViewHandler doesn't hold onto the items source #24610
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Handle focus events using `FocusManager` #24355
    community ✨
  • Bump WinAppSDK to 1.6 #24266
    area-infrastructure
  • Move HybridWebView platform code to handlers #24479
    area-controls-hybridwebview
  • [Android] Entry & Picker VerticalTextAlignment ignored #21966
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-entry, area-controls-picker
  • [C] avoid concurrent access to _values #24579
    area-xaml
  • Navigation memory leak: Appearing event not being unsubscribed properly #24507
    area-navigation, community ✨
  • Fix cake script to generate screenshots locally #24319
    area-testing
  • NavigationBarColors from NavigationPage not changing on AppTheme changin - fix #23343
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, do-not-merge, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar
  • Port all remaining Xamarin.UITest tests to Appium #24153
    area-testing
  • Android Ecosystem updates for `net9.0-rc.2` #24665
    do-not-merge
  • [Android] Allow full screen videos from WebView #15472
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area-controls-webview
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8 #24206
  • Implicitly set SupportedOSPlatformVersion #23857
    9.0-rc2
  • Applying visibility change to child controls #20154
    community ✨, area-controls-general
  • Implement touch interception for layouts on Android #13725
    area-layout, platform/android 🤖, Backlog
  • Fix Android flyout button (burger) visibility not reevaluated when orientation changes #24469
    area-navigation, community ✨
  • [Android] Fix for Scrolling of Editor placed in ScollView issue #24531
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-editor
